description: Intuit TurboTax allows users to enter or import data to prepare their U.S. Federal and State tax returns. Users can then print their return, to mail and file it themselves, or eFile their return from within TurboTax.

Some versions of TurboTax produce TVL data files as part of their installation process. TurboTax references data from these files. Thus, you should not edit, move, or delete the TVL files that TurboTax creates.
